overview: On November 22, 2004, the Utah Jazz placed Number 12 in the rafters of the Delta Center, honoring John Stocktons legendary career. Stockton played 19 record setting seasons in the NBA. The Leagues all-time leader in assists and steals propelled the Jazz to two appearances in the NBA Finals and was named one of the 50 greatest players in NBA history.
tagline: All Time Leader in Assists and Steals
title: Stockton Forever
